          Sets the underlying prp that determines the type of encryption that will be performed, and the padding scheme to use.

Uses of PaddingScheme in edu.biu.scapi.paddings
 

Classes in edu.biu.scapi.paddings that implement PaddingScheme
 class BitPadding
          Concrete padding class that implements the BitPadding padding scheme, but instead of adding 10...0 bits, it adds 10...0 bytes.
 class NoPadding
           
 class PKCS7Padding
          Concrete padding class implements the PKCS7 padding algorithm: the input shall be padded at the trailing end with k-(lth mod k) octets all having value k-(lth mod k), where lth is the length of the input.

          Constructor that receives the padding scheme and random to use.
